QuestData.Title: The Forgotten Pools
QuestData.Description: Have you felt the tremors, $c? Something has cleaved this land in two. But we druids can sense other tremors, as well.$B$BLife is stirring in lands once dry and lifeless. The oases around the Crossroads are suddenly blooming. I can sense a power leaking its way to the surface, but from where? Is it related to the disaster that shattered the Barrens?$B$BWe must find the source. Travel to the Forgotten Pools, northwest of the Crossroads. Search its waters for a source of power, then return here.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Explore the waters of the Forgotten Pools
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the bottom of the Forgotten Pools northwest of the Crossroads.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you been to the Forgotten Pools, $n? Did you find anything?
QuestData.RewardText: You found a fissure in the earth, with power emanating from it? Strange. Something is causing that oasis to bubble over suddenly with life.$B$BCome, $c - there is something else I'd like you to investigate with me.
